_description: A song of the Trinity — five quatrains (abab) and burden: ‘O meruelous & blessed natiuite / Off goddes sone in diuinite’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Welcome be thys blissed feestOff iesu christ in
                    trinite…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…to mak vs wisse in wark & wordto praysse & pleasse
                    þe trinite
BodEngPoete1.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,
                        ed.  
             Songs and Carols from a manuscript…of the Fifteenth
                Century.
Percy Society
         23. London: Richards, 1847: 83-4.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 28; 1977, 23.
